name: Dungeon Catastrophe
description:
Title: Dungeon Catastrophe

Platform: Html Game

Genre: Text Adventure

Rating: E 10+

Target Market: Ages 8+, casual gamers

Game Overview: Having entered one of the world's most dangerous dungeons, it is up to your to explore. However, be careful where you go and where you step or you might just find yourself outside of the living world.

Instructions: Press the button above to play. Click the text to choose your destiny.

Game Design Team: MacGregor Bracken
